import React from "react"; import { MDBCol, MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBBtn, MDBBadge, MDBCarousel, MDBCarouselCaption, MDBCarouselInner, MDBCarouselItem, Testimonial, MDBAvatar, MDBStepper, MDBStep, MDBView, MDBProgress, MDBMask, MDBCardBody, MDBCardTitle, MDBIcon, MDBCard, MDBCardImage, } from "mdbreact"; const AboutContent = (props) => { return (
{/* */}
The idea of Nakwa Arms was born when founder, Eric Nana Ntiamoah{" "}
a Natural Medicine Reseacher and Co-founder Kwaku Adu Baah{" "}
dicovered a new way humans can improve their health with pleasure , as a
result of the exploitation of the Noni plant and other medicinal crops .

THE MISSION

After persistent research and experiments, a special type of alcohol generated from Noni fruit was discovered. This medicinal alcohol together with other discoveries like natural honey-jell produced by a plant called 'Samanea' and other herbal flavours like 'hibiscus' and ‘Aidan fruit ’ substitutes high chemical flavours and sweeteners used by most producers. All these medicinal ingredients have been brought together to form 100% organic products which is focused on allowing consumers to not only Enjoy Pleasure but improve and maintain good Health. We want to build a community of Health-focused Consumers through Noni. Hence our value proposition is to sell the benefit of pleasure and good health to our various consumers.

There are about 2.3billion alcohol consumers in the world, over 900 million in Africa and 7.6million in Ghana. (Statista) “You can’t stop people from drinking, but you can add value to what they drink and how it impacts their lives”.
); }; export default AboutContent;
